# `r paste0(pal::desc_value(key = "Package"), ": ", pal::desc_value(key = "Title"))`

`r pal::desc_value(key = "Description")`

```{r, documentation, eval = !isTRUE(getOption("pal.build_readme.is_pkgdown")), results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
pkgsnip::md_snip(name = "pkgdown_notice") %>%
  paste0("## Documentation\n\n", .) %>%
  pal::cat_lines()
```

## Installation

```{r, install-snippet-dev, child = pkgsnip::snip_path("installation-notice_dev-version_gitlab.Rmd")}
```

```{r, usage, eval = isTRUE(getOption("pal.build_readme.is_pkgdown")), results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
pkgsnip::md_snip(name = "usage_notice") %>%
  paste0("## Usage\n\n", .) %>%
  pal::cat_lines()
```
